Pre-Game Insights: The Colorado Rockies (49-84) host the Miami Marlins (48-84) at Coors Field on Thursday, August 29, 2024.
The moneyline on this matchup has the Marlins at +109 and the Rockies are priced at -131.
The pitchers who are expected to start are Valente Bellozo for the Marlins and Bradley Blalock for the Rockies.
As a team, the Miami Marlins are recording 3.7 runs per outing, which has them sitting at 29th in MLB.
The Marlins have a team OBP of .296 and have hit 122 home runs this season.
The Marlins pitching staff has a collective WHIP of 1.39 and a team ERA of 4.72, ranking 28th in MLB.
The Marlins bullpen has a save percentage of 52.1% and has entered the game in 110 save situations.
The Colorado Rockies have an OBP of .306 and a batting average of .244 this season.
The Rockies have hit 145 home runs and have a team slugging percentage of .400.
The Rockies pitching staff has a team ERA of 5.53, ranking 30th in MLB.
The Rockies bullpen has a save percentage of 55.6% and has entered the game in 54 save chances.
